remarks: Define positive operator ordering.  Definition VI.1 of [Retherford] p. 49.  Note that ` ( ~H X. 0H ) <_op T ` means that ` T ` is a positive operator.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-leop $p |- <_op = { <. t , u >. | ( ( u -op t ) e. HrmOp /\ A. x e. ~H 0 <_ ( ( ( u -op t ) ` x ) .ih x ) ) } $.
$d t u x $.
